description.mek_x_star.space_suit: Turns the MekaSuit into a space suit
description.mek_x_star.oxygen_tank: Makes your body armor have an oxygen tank to breath from
description.mek_x_star.space_suit_insula: Adds insulation to the MekaSuit so you don't freeze
description.mek_x_star.heat_resistive: Makes your MekaSuit heat resistive from hot planets
creativetab.mek_x_star.name: Mekanism x Create: Northstar Items
